Document.Title: The vbYesNoCancel Form with the VBA.MsgBox Statement

Content:
'The following design should speak for itself:

    Select Case VBA.MsgBox("Yes, No or Cancel?", _
        vbQuestion + vbYesNoCancel)
        Case vbYes
            'The Yes case.
        Case vbNo
            'The No case.
        Case vbCancel
            'The Cancel case.
    End Select
